I am currently a postdoctoral researcher at the [Maurice Lamontagne Institute](https://www.qc.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/en/maurice-lamontagne-institute) in Mont-Joli, Quebec, Canada, with [Fisheries and Oceans Canada](https://www.dfo-mpo.gc.ca/index-eng.html). My research focuses on recent changes in white shark presence in Atlantic Canadian waters and their interactions with grey seals. To address this ecological question, I use acoustic and satellite telemetry technologies.
